text: The 1730s BC was a decade lasting from January 1, 1739 BC to December 31, 1730 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1736 BCâ€“According to the ultra-long chronology of the ancient Near East, this is the year the sack of Babylon occurred. ==Significant people== * Samsu-iluna, king of Babylon since 1750 BC, according to the middle chronology * Rim-Sin I, ruler of the Middle Eastern city-state of Larsa since 1758 BC, according to the short chronology. That same chronology records his death as being in 1699 BC. ==References== Category:18th century BC
title: 1730s BC
